about.details:
Incorporated in 1992, Zodiac Energy Limited is Ahmedabad, Gujrat based Energy Solution Provider company. Company provides turnkey solutions from concept to commissioning of power plants. The services provided by the company include design, supply, installation, testing and commissioning (EPC) and operation & maintenance (O&M).

Zodiac Energy has installed solar power plants for many prominent clients like Sun-Edison India Limited, Adani Group, Torrent Power Limited, Gujarat Energy development Agency, Reserve Bank of India, Directorate of Lighthouse and Lightships Government of India (GoI), Indian Oil Corporation Limited to name a few. The company has installed more than 6,000 KW of Rooftop solar power plants till now and it envisages to reach at 10,000 KW by end of 2017-18.

contactDetails.full_address: Zodiac Energy Limited, A-1204 Siddhi Vinayak Towers, Off S G Highway Makarba Vejalpur, Ahmedabad 380 051

faqs.question: What is the Zodiac Energy?
faqs.answer:
Zodiac Energy is a SME IPO of 1950000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.14 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹52 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on November 23, 2017, and closes on November 27, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Zodiac Energy through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Zodiac Energy using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Zodiac Energy by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Zodiac Energy through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Zodiac Energy' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Zodiac Energy will open?
faqs.answer: The Zodiac Energy opens on November 23, 2017 and closes on November 27, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Zodiac Energy?
faqs.answer: Zodiac Energy lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,04,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Zodiac Energy?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Zodiac Energy online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
